data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Modern 1 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains a set of modern characters in a variety of professions.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Body
  • Female Creeper
  • Female Hacker
  • Female Jane Doe
  • Female Model
  • Female Outline
  • Female Professional
  • Female School Girl
  • Male Assassin
  • Male Bartender
  • Male Bomb Disposal
  • Male Business Man
  • Male Doctor
  • Male Face Man
  • Male Hacker
  • Male Hazmat
  • Male Infiltrator
  • Male Mad Scientist
  • Male Police Officer
  • Male Security Guard
  • Male Truck Driver

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license. This product works with all rulesets.

data.short_description: This token pack contains a set of modern characters in a variety of professions.This Token Pack includes:Female BodyFemale CreeperFemale HackerFemale Jane DoeFemale ModelFemale OutlineFemale ProfessionalFemale School GirlMale AssassinMale BartenderMale Bomb DisposalMale Business ManMale DoctorMale Face ManMale HackerMale HazmatMale...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
